Context: The LLC Laptop Loan Policy at George Brown College has undergone changes as of December 18, 2023. Each campus maintains its own stock of tech items such as keyboards and presentation clickers. Students are required to return all borrowed technology equipment to the respective LLC location. A limited supply of calculators is available at the library; students may check the GBC Bookstore for purchase. For more information, contact 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's website contents are subject to change without notice and should not be considered as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students must verify their fee requirements.
